No I think it is a Yahoo thing. Sometimes I have to try 3 or 4 times before=
 it will load.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: mrscaptainjack2 
  =
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, November 03, 2009 12:56 PM
  =
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: New stuff.


    Just wanted you to know that I didn=
't comment because I can't hear 99% of the files you post -- for some reaso=
n (probably my stupid computer), they just won't play for me. Which is a sh=
ame, because I really wanted to hear them! 

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om, "purplespacefriend" <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
  >
  > It's just like=
 these, not one comment on them. I still hear them as I did a couple weeks =
ago. Not "standard" (whatever that is) EVP, but why should it be ignored, u=
nless of course I'm imagining what I heard. 
  > 
  > I think the reason fo=
r this kind of stuff is multi level. First, it shows EVP/box voices are not=
 the usual HW BS. Second, there's infinite levels that come through, some i=
f it deceptive(yet teaches). Most important, I think it pokes fun at what w=
e think we know is out there. 
  > 
  > I sent these to one of the author/e=
xperts and as usual--no response--they seemingly know so much better. It ju=
st does not fit the haunting/ghost hunter paradigm--where the megabucks and=
 fame is. 
  > 
  > And yeah, I've spent the last week moving, I'm physical=
ly tired, and mentally have the usual case of torqued jaws. 
  > 
  > F-S
 =
 > 
  > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@> w=
rote:
  > >
  > > I know, not proper EVP, but ....Now I have cartoon spirit=
s---LOL! I think
  > > the "woman" mentioned is maybe LK, something aobut R=
adio Shack in the middle
  > > of that.
  > > 
  > > These are not presente=
d for feedback, just what I got last night.
  > > 
  > > F-S
  > >
  >
